title: rustfmt is not getting backtraces anymore

labels.name: A-parser
labels.description: Area: The parsing of Rust source code to an AST.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
with beta:
Backtrace

``` thread 'main' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1679:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f1db46a9cca - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hbbcc434e126c5eca at /rustc/2013813b65016b39d456a12e3b0a90366e9fb5e3/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f1db46a9cca - 40: 0x0 - ```

with nightly `rustfmt 1.5.2-nightly (69fef92 2023-05-13)` `RUST_BACKTRACE=full rustfmt 8E72B7907D9D7F81DC6329AAC44D7D42D638688A0797C99F636739F9BFE5BEC1.rs` ```` note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustfmt/issues/new?labels=bug note: rustc 1.71.0-nightly (69fef92ab 2023-05-13) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack ```` Could this be a sideeffect of 2469afef1a9697e671f9e90971c342fa3e0006e6 ? cc @jyn514 File to make rustfmt crash is attached (--check is sufficient) [ice.rs.zip](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/11469273/ice.rs.zip)
